name: Rock Paper Terminal
description: Changes RPS to (kinda) the Oblivion color scheme. Perfect to use in conjunction with Rock Paper Centered
additional_info:
Features
- Changes the text to green, background to black, links to red. Including the comment box. - Red line of the left-side of the comments to easily follow the threads. - Works on the main page - Works with admin comments - Font changes to fix Linux issues
Known Issues
- White margin around the comments, can't seem to fix it
If you don't use Rock Paper Centered most of the background won't be black, but the rest works. If you change it yourself let me know and I'll gladly link to your style
